'''Spices From the West: Northerly Search''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 3.5]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/03/31 10:00 - 2023/04/10 03:59

===Requirements===
* Reach [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above to create seasonings
* Reach Adventure Rank 28 or above and complete the World Quest "[[Idle Teapot Talk]]" to cook the corresponding dishes and invite characters to taste-test
===Summary===
* During the event, make seasonings according to the recipes provided to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s and [[Character Talent Material]]s. Cook [[dishes]] with said seasonings and invite [[character]]s to taste-test to increase their [[Companionship EXP]].
* A new seasoning recipe will unlock on each of the first 7 days of the event. Follow the recipes to create "Fragrant Seasonings" and obtain corresponding rewards.
* Add the Fragrant Seasonings to Delicious dishes to obtain Fragrant dishes. You can invite characters to taste-test the Fragrant Dishes in your Serenitea Pot to increase their Companionship EXP and also hear their responses, which will vary based on the character's personal preferences. There is a limit on the number of times you can get Companionship EXP during the event.
** For each Fragrant Dish you share with a character, that respective character will gain 100 Companionship EXP.
** There are 21 opportunities to increase a character's Companionship EXP, with three unlocked with each recipe.
** Feeding a character already at Friendship Level 10 will not count towards the 21 opportunity limit.
* During the event, you can invite Paimon to your Serenitea Pot to sample your dishes. Inviting Paimon to sample your dishes will not increase Companionship EXP, but also will not consume from the limited number of times you can get Companionship EXP.
* Reach Adventure Rank 28 and complete the "A Teapot to Call Home" quest to unlock the Serenitea Pot. You can accept the "Idle Teapot Talk" quest from Tubby in the Serenitea Pot. After completing the quest and obtaining "Realm Dispatch," you can invite characters to your Serenitea Pot to sample your dishes.
* After 2023/04/10 03:59:59, "Fragrant Seasonings" and "Fragrant Dishes" will be removed from your Inventory.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Spices From the West Northerly Search 1.png
|text1 = During the event, Travelers can utilize recipes that they unlock to create seasonings before adding these seasonings to "Delicious" dishes to obtain "Fragrant" dishes. Invite characters in your Serenitea Pot to try these Fragrant dishes out to increase their Companionship EXP and also receive different reactions from them based on their tastes.
|image2 = Tutorial Spices From the West Northerly Search 2.png
|text2 = When you begin making the seasonings, the needle on the slider will move back and forth from edge to edge. Follow the instructions given on the recipe and {{Control|tap|click|press}} the button as the needle points to the corresponding ingredient to add them to the pot.
|image3 = Tutorial Spices From the West Northerly Search 3.png
|text3 = The number of {{Control|Tap|Click|Press}} attempts you can make will decrease by 1 each time the needle reaches both ends, or when you make a mistake in adding an ingredient. Add the correct number of ingredients before you use up all your attempts and you will succeed, or this seasoning-making attempt shall be considered a failure.
|image4 = Tutorial Spices From the West Northerly Search 4.png
|text4 = The ingredients needed for this recipe can be purchased {{Color|Menu|in restaurants}} or at {{Color|Menu|general stores}} or found {{Color|Menu|in the wild}}.
|image5 = Tutorial Spices From the West 5.png
|text5 = Unlock the Serenitea Pot and complete the Idle Teapot Talk quest to invite characters into your Serenitea Pot to try your food. When they try your food, characters' Companionship EXP will increase, and they will also give comments based on their individual tastes.
}}

|I || Cool and Sour-Sweet

|-
|II || Rich Aroma
|{{Card|Pepper|1}}{{Card|Onion|2}}{{Card|Milk|1}}
|The doubled mellow aroma of Onions and Peppers brings a distinctive tickle on the taste buds.

|{{Card|Pinecone|1}}{{Card|Snapdragon|1}}{{Card|Mint|2}}
|The smoothness of Pinecones blended with the light fragrance of Mints and augmented with the unique taste of Snapdragons can create a well-balanced seasoning capable of being universally applied to different dishes.
|-
|IV || Flavor of Windrise
|{{Card|Small Lamp Grass|1}}{{Card|Dandelion Seed|2}}{{Card|Mint|2}}
|The Dandelion Seeds, brought by the wind, accompanied by Small Lamp Grass and Mint, make creating refreshing flavors a cakewalk.

|-
|VII || Fruits and Cream
|{{Card|Cream|1}}{{Card|Mint|1}}{{Card|Wolfhook|4}}
|The sour taste of Wolfhooks and the fragrance of Mint are blended into Cream to create something new and most pleasant indeed.
|}

===Character Preferences===
Travelers may invite characters to taste-test the Fragrant Dishes in their Serenitea Pot to increase their Companionship EXP. The characters' personal preferences vary, and they respond with different voice-overs and visual effects depending on how much they like what they are given.

For brevity and convenience, all reactions are considered to be ''Like'', ''Neutral'', or ''Dislike''. Any dish not listed in a character's row garners a ''Neutral'' reaction from that character.
